name: 3-D Space Battle
overview: 3-D Space Battle is a 1-player space shooter for the Apple II. The player flies a spaceship from a first person perspective, with the goal of shooting alien vessels. A small radar screen in the bottom right of the screen shows the location of vessels. The player can take a limited number of hits before their ship is destroyed. The player has limited fuel, and must attempt to destroy as many vessels as possible.
